conclusion: Analyze the paths of the liquids from points A, B, and C.
Liquid flows from A to the right.
Liquid from A encounters a red baffle that directs it downward.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid flows from B to the right.
Liquid from B encounters a red baffle that directs it downward.
Liquid from B flows into container F.
Liquid flows from C to the right.
Liquid from C encounters a red baffle that directs it downward.
Liquid from C flows into container G.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid from B flows into container F.
Liquid from C flows into container G.
